rebuttal.content: While some claim that the suppression of free speech is primarily due to the influence of social media platforms, the real cause lies in the lack of comprehensive media literacy education. Abolishing or regulating these platforms won't address the underlying issue of how individuals critically engage with information. Without proper education on discerning credible sources, users may still fall victim to misinformation regardless of the platform's policies. Thus, focusing on enhancing media literacy is essential for fostering a well-informed public.
